query: uptime guarantees and service availability commitments

retrieved_clauses.clause_text: Service Availability Guarantee: Provider guarantees 99.9% uptime for the Service on a monthly basis. Uptime is calculated as the percentage of time the Service is available and accessible to Customer during each calendar month, excluding Scheduled Maintenance and Force Majeure events.

Service Credits: In the event Provider fails to meet the Service Availability Guarantee, Customer shall be entitled to Service Credits calculated as follows: 95-99.8% uptime: 10% monthly fee credit; 90-94.9% uptime: 25% monthly fee credit; below 90% uptime: 50% monthly fee credit. Service Credits are Customer's sole remedy for service unavailability.

Response Time Commitments: Provider commits to respond to Critical Priority incidents within 1 hour, High Priority incidents within 4 hours, and Normal Priority incidents within 24 hours from the time of Customer notification. Response times are measured during Business Hours only.
